about_the_game:
Technicolor carnivals, passionate rhythms and overflowing joy — is this what comes to your mind when you say “Brazil”? But everyone at Fishing Planet knows: a real angler gets an even stronger endorphin rush when they imagine the Amazon fishing, brighter than a carnival and even more desired! Make your dream come true, set off hunting for exotic fishes, including the Bull Shark, the Piraiba and the Electric Eel. And to have better chances in landing these guys, you can get your Amazon Carnival Pack, a set that has the best gear for fishing in this part of the tropics: new jigging spoons, duo swimbaits, as well as a powerful casting rod and a durable reel. In addition, the swift twin-engined Bass Boat Sagitta will promptly take you to any point at the waterway even against the flow! Of course, the Pack includes the Advanced Brazil License and a 30-day Pond Pass to the Amazonian Maze!

Amazon Carnival Pack includes:
* 40000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 30-DAYS PREMIUM
* 25 Marker Buoys
* 25 Slots
* 1 Tackle Setup Slots

MOTOR BOATS
* Garry Scott™ Sagitta™ Bass Boat - Length: 23 ft (700 cm); Width: 6 ft (185 cm); Weight: 2183 Lb; Engine: 300 hp (990 kg); Echo Sounder: Oem, Pro

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* MagFin™ TropiCana™ 7' 7"" (230 ) SE - Length: 7' 7"" (2.3 m); Lure Weight: 7/8 – 3 1/6 Oz ( 24–90 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 35,3–88 Lb (16–40 kg); Action: Fast
Reels:
* MagFin™ Bailarina 7500 SE - Ratio: 6.7; Recovery: 37""(95 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/150, Braid 30/265 (0.5/150, Braid 0.28/265); Max Drag: 83.7 Lb (38 kg); Brake: Magnetic & Centrifugal

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m):
* Mono .033"" ( 0.85 mm) - Test: 83.7 Lb (38 kg)
* Fluoro .033"" ( 0.85 mm) -Test: 79 Lb (36 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .033 (0.85 mm) - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 79 Lb (36 kg) (x10)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .033 ( 0.85 mm) - Length: 1.64’ (0.5 m); Test: 79 Lb (36 kg) (x10)
* Titanium Leader .018 - Length: 0.82’ (0.25 m); Test: 81.5 Lb (37 kg) (x10)
* Titanium Leader .018 - Length: 1.64’ (0.5 m); Test: 81.5 Lb (37 kg) (x10)
* Swimbaits: Duo Swimbait 2 Oz. (56 g), #4/0; Duo Swimbait 2 1/2 Oz.(71 g), #8/0 (x4)
* Jig Heads: 2 1/4 Oz.(64 g), #4/0; 2 1/4 Oz.(64 g), #6/0; 2 1/2 Oz.(71 g), #4/0; 2 1/2 Oz.(71 g), #6/0; 3 Oz.(84 g), #6/0; 3 Oz.(84 g), #8/0 (x10)
* Spoons: Jigging Spoon 2 Oz.(56 g), #6/0; Jigging Spoon 2 1/2 Oz.(71 g), #7/0; Jigging Spoon 3 Oz.(84 g), #8/0 (x20)
* Soft Baits: Shad 6"" (15 cm), Slug 6"" (15 cm), Craw 6"" (15 cm), Twin Tail Spider Grub 6"" (15 cm) (x20)

EQUIPMENT
* Garry Scott™ FishStronghold M Plus Keepnet - Max Single Fish Weight: 308 Lb (140 kg); Total Fish Weight: 925 Lb (420 kg)

POND PASSES:
Amazonian Maze Pass (30 Day)

FISHING LICENSES (30 days):
Advanced Brazil License
detailed_description:
Technicolor carnivals, passionate rhythms and overflowing joy — is this what comes to your mind when you say “Brazil”? But everyone at Fishing Planet knows: a real angler gets an even stronger endorphin rush when they imagine the Amazon fishing, brighter than a carnival and even more desired! Make your dream come true, set off hunting for exotic fishes, including the Bull Shark, the Piraiba and the Electric Eel. And to have better chances in landing these guys, you can get your Amazon Carnival Pack, a set that has the best gear for fishing in this part of the tropics: new jigging spoons, duo swimbaits, as well as a powerful casting rod and a durable reel. In addition, the swift twin-engined Bass Boat Sagitta will promptly take you to any point at the waterway even against the flow! Of course, the Pack includes the Advanced Brazil License and a 30-day Pond Pass to the Amazonian Maze!

* 40000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 30-DAYS PREMIUM
* 25 Marker Buoys

* Spoons: Jigging Spoon 2 Oz.(56 g), #6/0; Jigging Spoon 2 1/2 Oz.(71 g), #7/0; Jigging Spoon 3 Oz.(84 g), #8/0 (x20)

Amazonian Maze Pass (30 Day)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
